snippet.title: Football Manager 2024 | Official Announce Trailer | #FM24
snippet.description:
Perfect your tactic, search for the next wonderkid and find your winning edge - because Progress Never Stops.

Football Manager 2024 - the 20th and most complete edition to date. Out from November 6th across platforms.

• FM24 on PC/Mac
• FM24 Console on Xbox, Xbox Game Pass and PlayStation 5
• FM24 Touch on Nintendo Switch
• FM24 Mobile arrives exclusively to Netflix

Pre-purchase FM24 and FM24 Console anytime before Nov 6th for 10% off - with Early Access on PC/Mac (Steam and Epic)

Pre-purchase here 👉 https://fm24.store/Pre-Purchase

Click here for our Features Roadmap, further platform details and release info 👉 https://fm24.news/ReleaseDate

And join our FMFC squad to take advantage of early and exclusive feature news, prize giveaways and insights across the season 👉 FMFC.info/SignUp
